remarks: An operation maps to a class to which all values belong, analogous to ~ ffnov .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-May-2017.)
statement:
ffnaov $p |- ( F : ( A X. B ) --> C <-> ( F Fn ( A X. B ) /\ A. x e. A A. y e. B (( x F y )) e. C ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d F x y $.
